Adventurer Helper:
One more time...
Kill the Marsh Stalkers, Marsh Drakes, Fallen Orcs, Ancient Gargoyles, Fallen Orc Archers, Sharp Talon Tigers, Fallen Orc Shamans, and Fallen Orc Captains until 40 Legacy Cores have been collected. The cores go to Captain Curtis in the Town of Aden, who will tally up the cores and reward you if the correct number have been reclaimed.
